content: That's a great list, thank you! I'll definitely check some of those out. I'm particularly interested in plays with strong ensemble casts, since I've been taking acting classes and I think that would be a great way to challenge myself. By the way, have you come across any information about the role of women in the industry, particularly in terms of representation and diversity? I've been reading a lot of interviews and articles about that lately, and it's really got me thinking.
